subject: Psychology
title: Emotional Contagion
description: Learn Emotional Contagion in one minute.

hook.text: One person yawns and the whole room follows. Emotions spread the same way ‚Äî and much faster.

buildup.text: Emotional contagion is the automatic transfer of emotions between people through facial expressions and tone.

discovery.text: It happens in milliseconds, below conscious awareness. You 'catch' a friend's anxiety without knowing why.

twist.text: Social media amplifies emotional contagion. A 2014 Facebook study showed posts altered millions of moods.

climax.text: Emotions aren't just personal ‚Äî they're social. One person's mood ripples through entire networks.

punchline.text: Emotions are contagious. Choose your company wisely.
